column2: The delapiatated structure held many secrets. Bird nests"," vagrant camps","  and overturned inscriptions. Ancient peoples seem to have picked the ruins clean","  there was dust and antiquity where there had once been grandeur and treasure. Although","  there was dust and antiquity where there had once been grandeur and treasure. Although","  it seems they missed something deep within the tumbled bricks and ruined coffers","

These old ruins are considered a horrible"," magical place by all those who live near. Upon investigating"," it appears these rumors are exageration. Instead only one point of interest remains among the rubble","
